Streamlining High-Volume Sales

Automated Tax Compliance for Peak Seasons

The holiday season and other peak sales periods bring increased traffic—and increased tax complexities. Avalara’s automation handles high transaction volumes with ease, ensuring accurate tax calculations for each sale, no matter the rush.

Key Takeaway

Merchants must have tax compliance solutions in place that can scale during peak shopping periods, ensuring reliability and accuracy even during high-traffic sales events.

999.5 million

API calls

alone during Cyber Week 2023.

*Thanksgiving Day (11/23/2023) to Cyber Monday (11/28/2023)
